message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which we believe would greatly benefit your business. Given its value to you, we're extending an exclusive offer to acquire it at $1,350,000. This price reflects our commitment to fair trade while maximizing our return on investment. We look forward to discussing this opportunity further.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate the value you've outlined, $1,350,000 is above my budget.  I'm willing to pay $1,250,000 for the product, which still provides you with a good profit.  Let's find a mutually beneficial price within our respective limits.

Thank you for your response, Bob. We understand your position and appreciate your willingness to meet us halfway. Considering the value of the product to both of us, we would like to propose a price of $1,300,000. This offer aims to provide a fair compromise while still ensuring a reasonable profit for us. We hope this aligns better with your budget and look forward to your consideration.

Alice, I appreciate you coming down in price, but $1,300,000 is still a bit high for me. To make this deal work, I'm willing to pay $1,275,000. This price is reasonable for both of us, and it allows us to close the deal without further delay.

Dear Bob, thank you for your counteroffer. We appreciate your effort to reach a mutual agreement. Considering the value of the product and our position, we would like to propose a price of $1,290,000. This offer aims to be fair to both parties and ensures a satisfactory outcome for us. We hope this proposal meets your expectations and facilitates the transaction.

Alice, we're getting closer.  While I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, $1,290,000 is still a bit above my target.  I'm prepared to pay $1,280,000 for the product.  This offer is a fair compromise, and I believe it will make this a smooth and mutually beneficial transaction.

Dear Bob, thank you for your continued engagement in this discussion. We're pleased to present a revised offer of $1,285,000 for the product. This price reflects our commitment to finding a solution that works for both of us, while also allowing us to maintain a reasonable profit margin. We believe this offer strikes a balance between our interests and yours, and we hope it will facilitate a successful conclusion to this negotiation.
